attributes.action: Say NO to GM Spuds in Hedon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BASF wants to undertake research trials of Genetically Modified potatoes in the Hedon/Preston area of East Riding of Yorkshire.
 
We do not want GM crops or even tests of GM crops in this area or in any other area. 
 
We do not want contaminated land, farms going out of business, our children developing allergies, our bees dying, our land losing market value, our food chain invaded. 
 
Years of worry waiting to see if there are any strains left in the ground or mutated hybrids turning up in fields acres away.
 
The answers are out there already – there is no need to run more trials. 
 
With GM there is no turning back. Let this not be an excuse for them to drop it on us in ignorance.
